function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adequate common spaces for socialization within the building","Impact":"Limited opportunities for safe social activities and gatherings, increasing the risk of close contact and potential disease transmission","Mitigation":"Creating additional common areas and outdoor spaces for socialization, implementing social distancing measures, and promoting outdoor activities","Technologies":"Prefabricated structures, outdoor furniture, green spaces, ventilation systems","People":"Tenants, visitors, residents","Owner":"Building management, property developers"},{"Description":"Inadequate housing design for pandemic conditions","Impact":"Limited flexibility in apartment layouts and function, leading to discomfort and dissatisfaction among residents","Mitigation":"Flexible apartment design, movable partitions, and adaptable living spaces to meet changing needs and pandemic-related requirements","Technologies":"Movable partitions, modular furniture, adaptable fixtures","People":"Residents, property developers, architects","Owner":"Property developers, architects"},{"Description":"Loss of community and engagement within the building","Impact":"Decreased sense of community and social connection, leading to feelings of isolation, loneliness, and disconnection","Mitigation":"Creating engaging and quality environments for safe outdoor social activities, promoting community events and initiatives, and fostering a sense of belonging among residents","Technologies":"Urban agriculture, outdoor gathering spaces, community event management platforms","People":"Tenants, residents","Owner":"Building management, community organizers"}]}
